about.title: Who We Are
about.quote: "We are the bridge between real and digital."
about.text: At Nova Solidum Finances, we believe that the future of finance should be simple, accessible and connected. It's not about choosing between the traditional or digital world, but about building a bridge between the two. We created the best and most secure crypto ecosystem so that anyone can buy, use and live crypto in a practical and reliable way. Our commitment is to transform digital assets into real solutions, bringing technology closer to the daily lives of people and businesses.
about.highlight: "The best and most secure link between real and digital."

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Connect people, businesses and communities to the cryptocurrency universe, offering secure and accessible solutions that simplify the use of digital finance in everyday life.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: By 2030, be the main reference in Brazil and Latin America in integration between traditional and digital economy, consolidating Nova Solidum as the best and most secure crypto ecosystem.

history.title: Our History
history.text: Nova Solidum was born to solve a real problem: the entry barrier to the crypto market. While many got lost in complex platforms, we created a simple, secure and intuitive experience. From quick purchases with PIX to the possibility of merchants accepting cryptocurrencies, Nova Solidum emerged to empower people and businesses and connect the real to the digital.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.quote: "Connecting people, businesses and communities to the financial future."

Future integration with payment gateway allowing automation of financial flows between customers and suppliers.

ecosystem.title: Expanding Ecosystem
ecosystem.quote: "The future is hybrid, transparent and decentralized."
ecosystem.text: Nova Solidum Finances is not just another company with solutions for the Web3 market. It is a crypto asset operations intermediation platform that combines technology, regulatory compliance and operational efficiency to deliver a secure, accessible and economically advantageous experience to its users. With extremely competitive fees and infrastructure designed according to the highest international standards of compliance, security and traceability, Nova Solidum operates with full transparency and alignment with the guidelines of the Central Bank of Brazil and Law No. 14.478/2022 (Legal Framework for Crypto Assets). More than intermediating transactions, the company builds trust in each operation, creating an environment where users, merchants and investors can transact with autonomy, liquidity and institutional support. Its commitment is to be a reference in solidity, innovation and regulatory adherence, consolidating itself as a digital financial hub prepared for the future of the decentralized economy
